publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2466 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeesâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Education, Culture and Sport Committee is designated as lead committee in consideration of the School Meals (Scotland) Bill and that the Local Government Committee, the Health and Community Care Committee and the Social Justice Committee be secondary committees. Supported by: Euan Robson*
